help.instructions:
Help - Bot Commands 
 Find 'Service Name' or 'Service ID'

show.noparameter: I need a parameter for your Show request; for example: 'show all'

select.noparameter: I need a parameter for your Select request; for example: 'select 102 04'

organization.instructions: Organizations can be managed by use the following phrases - (add organization|remove organization|update organization)

directory.instructions: The Social Services Directory can be managed by use the following phrases - (show directory|associate organization|remove organization)
